sentences.sContent: Political power has been placed in the hands of the multitude.
sentences.sCn: 政治权力已交到民众手中。

remMethod.val: multi(多) + t + ude(表状态， 名词后缀) → 多的状态 → 大量， 众多

trans.tranCn: 大量， 众多； 群众， 民众； 人群
trans.tranOther: ordinary people, especially when they are thought of as not being very well educated
